write_surf_data

Source: R/neuro_surface.R
write_surf_data.Rd

write_surf_data

write_surf_data(bsurf, outstem, hemi = "")

Arguments

bsurf

a class of type NeuroSurface or NeuroSurfaceVector
outstem

the name of the output file, not including extension
hemi

name of hemisphere ("lh" or "rh")
